intro:
Guess the world. Learn the world. Master the map.
Explore new countries, cities, and iconic landmarks!
description:
How accurately can you locate places on the world map? Put your knowledge, intuition, and geography skills to the test!

Geo IQ World Master is an educational and competitive geography exploration game built around predicting locations on the world map. You’ll be shown a country, city, landmark, historical area, or tourist spot, and your goal is to pinpoint its location as accurately as possible. The closer your guess, the higher your score.

The game blends popular concepts like geography quizzes, map knowledge, location guessing, city and country guessing, and world trivia challenges. To improve your skills, you should build a Geo guesser system that helps you predict locations using clues from around the globe.

Each level introduces new countries, cities, and cultural regions, helping you better understand continents, major destinations, and historical sites.

As you progress, you unlock special themed categories:
• Ancient Cities – Lost cities and historic centers of ancient civilizations
• War Locations – Key battlefields and strategic sites that shaped history
• Touristic Places – The world’s most iconic and visited attractions

These themes turn Geo IQ World Master into a complete world exploration experience — far more than a standard geography test.

With its “guess and learn” system, players naturally discover world cultures, architecture, tourism, and history. Whether mastering the map alone or competing with friends, Geo IQ World Master offers a unique journey for every geography fan.

The world is a vast map waiting for you to explore. Are you ready?
